name: Revelation (itch) (doomlightning)
description:
After the end of the universe has come and everything is over, you find yourself in front of something and try to investigate it (out of boredom).

"Revelation" is an idle story/semi-rogue-like game in which you play as yourself to reveal what it is, in any way you have, and along the way, try to understand yourself and control the object's fate in front of you.

This is a prototype game built for the jam game "Jern Jam!" #1 and the theme is "start from the end".

becuse of non saveing progress, the game must be on for it to keep running

But it's not a long game either and it has an end(s).
